changeSet.author: anastasia.yurkova2003@gmail.com
changeSet.sql:
with series as ( select generate_series(1, 100) as sery )
insert into details(relationship_type, user_id, relationship_id) select case when s.sery % 5 = 0 then 'HUSBAND'::relationship_type_enum when s.sery % 4 = 0 then 'WIFE'::relationship_type_enum when s.sery % 3 = 0 then 'SON'::relationship_type_enum when s.sery % 2 = 0 then 'DAUGHTER'::relationship_type_enum when s.sery % 11 = 0 then 'FATHER'::relationship_type_enum when s.sery % 13 = 0 then 'MOTHER'::relationship_type_enum when s.sery % 9 = 0 then 'GRANDMOTHER'::relationship_type_enum else 'GRANDFATHER'::relationship_type_enum end, random()*((s.sery)-1)+1, random()*((s.sery)-1)+1 from series s
